title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Cook the spaghetti until al dente.
Combine spaghetti with bacon, remove from heat.
Quickly stir in the egg mixture and season with pepper.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato based gravy.
instructions: Marinate chicken in yogurt and spices.
Grill or pan-fry chicken until cooked.
Prepare sauce with onion, garlic, tomato puree, and cream.
Simmer chicken in the sauce until flavors blend.

title: Sushi Platter
summary: An assortment of fresh sushi rolls with salmon, tuna, and avocado.
instructions: Roll tightly and slice into pieces.

title: Margherita Pizza
summary: Classic Neapolitan pizza topped with tomatoes, mozzarella, and fresh basil.
instructions: Add mozzarella slices and basil leaves.
Bake until crust is golden and cheese is melted.

title: Beef Burger
summary: Juicy grilled beef patty with cheese, lettuce, tomato, and special sauce in a soft bun.
instructions: Grill beef patties until cooked to preference.
Assemble burger with patty, cheese, lettuce, tomato, onion, and sauce.

title: Caesar Salad
summary: Crisp romaine lettuce with creamy Caesar dressing, croutons, and parmesan cheese.
instructions: Drizzle Caesar dressing and toss well.

title: Pad Thai
summary: A popular Thai stir-fried rice noodle dish with shrimp, tofu, peanuts, and lime.
instructions: Add noodles, sauce, and beaten eggs.
Mix in bean sprouts and peanuts.

title: Chocolate Lava Cake
summary: A rich chocolate cake with a gooey molten chocolate center, served warm.
instructions: Bake until edges set but center is gooey.
